Old Age Home
During my internship at an old age home, I assisted with daily activities, 
engaged in recreational programs, and provided companionship to 
elderly residents. This experience taught me empathy, patience, and the 
importance of caring for the elderly in our society.

SUMMARY
I am a dedicated and detail-oriented professional 
seeking new opportunities to leverage my skills 
and experience. With a strong background in 
[Marketing], I am committed to making 
significant contributions in every role I pursue. 
My focus is on continuous learning and 
development, ensuring I remain competitive in 
my career. I aim to apply my expertise in a 
challenging position that also fosters my 
organization's success.
INTERESTS
I am passionate about marketing 
because it combines creativity, 
strategy, and communication to 
connect with audiences and drive 
business growth. I enjoy 
understanding consumer behavior and 
using innovative approaches to 
promote products and build strong 
brands.
STRENGTHS
Active Listening
Ability to understand and appreciate others' 
needs and perspectives.
Conflict Resolution
Skilled in resolving disagreements amicably 
and efficiently.
Continuous Learner
Capable of learning and adapting quickly to 
new challenges.
